An offline example form

You've loaded the page, congratulations. In order to test functionality, turn off your wifi, or network connection. You can reload the page, fill out the form, and hit “save”. Expected behavior is the app continues to load and your data is preserved across page loads/network failures. The idea here is that will spotty or non-existent network connections, a user could still fill out the form, then, when the network is available, they would be able to submit the form. \
